job_history.work_description: Reports and collaborates directly with the President to promote a culture of high performance and continuous growth by supporting all research and evaluation of new products, services and proposed logical solutions. Manage vendors to maintain and grow strong relationships by overseeing rates/pricing, contracts and resources Provided corporate executives with data to support new business development.

Managing the entire process, from sale to execution, employing consultative sales methods to exceed revenue goals and continue to grow client base; consistently achieved quota attainment. Conduct live product demonstrations & presentations via webinar. Renew existing business, increase spend and create new buyers in existing accounts by cultivating new relationships laterally and above the primary contact.

Handling Key Customer - Identify & analyze the client's requirements & propose customized solutions. Business Development B2B outside & inside Sales for naukri.com e-recruitment solutions with revenue growth of more than 40% for the last consecutive 4 years.

Setting up channel business of more than 20 partners for Good Life World (A Times of India Channel network to sell Timesjobs.com, Magicbricks.com & Simplymarry.com Services) in South Delhi & Gurgaon Region, INDIA. Business Development / Inside Sales - Making Presentations / Closure, Negotiation, Follow up Servicing / Account / Relationship Management.

Sourcing of High Value Home Loans from Corporate Clients by direct outside sales. Organizing sales Campaigns in different areas of Delhi & NCR, INDIA. Creating new client base for the products through aggressive marketing.

education.university: Fore School of Management in collaboration with Nottingham Business School, UK

skills.name: Sales Management
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in sales management roles, consistently achieving revenue goals and growing client base, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Business Development
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in business development, proposing customized solutions, and cultivating new relationships, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Marketing
skills.explanation: Experience in promoting a culture of high performance and continuous growth, supporting research and evaluation of new products and services, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Provided corporate executives with data to support new business development, showing a solid working proficiency in data analysis.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Experience in managing teams and vendors, overseeing rates/pricing, contracts, and resources, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Conducted live product demonstrations and presentations via webinar, and made presentations to clients, showing strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Relationship Management
skills.explanation: Cultivated new relationships, managed existing ones, and provided excellent customer service, indicating strong proficiency in relationship management.

skills.name: Negotiation
skills.explanation: Experience in negotiation, closing deals, and managing contracts, showing a solid working proficiency in negotiation.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Limited experience in managing projects, but has demonstrated ability to handle multiple tasks and responsibilities, indicating some practical experience.
